vernac_cmds: Require Import Bool Arith Max Omega Psatz List NPeano Permutation.
Notation "x ≤ y ≤ z" := (x ≤ y ∧ y ≤ z) (at level 70, y at next level).
Notation "x < y ≤ z" := (x < y ∧ y ≤ z) (at level 70, y at next level).
Notation "x ≤ y < z" := (x ≤ y ∧ y < z) (at level 70, y at next level).
Lemma S_is_suc n: S n = n+1.
Lemma or_idem: ∀ A, A ↔ A ∨ A.
Lemma and_idem: ∀ A, A ↔ A ∧ A.
Lemma and_left: ∀ A B, A ∧ B → A.
Lemma or_false_idem: ∀ A, A ↔ A ∨ False.
Definition fmono (f: nat → nat):= ∀ x y, x ≤ y → f x ≤ f y.
Lemma forall_and {A:Type} (P Q:A→Prop): (∀ x, P x ∧ Q x) ↔ ((∀ x, P x) ∧ (∀ x, Q x)).
Lemma forall_impl_and {A:Type} (R:A→Prop) (P Q:A→Prop): (∀ x, R x → P x ∧ Q x) ↔ ((∀ x, R x → P x) ∧ (∀ x, R x → Q x)).
Lemma forall_impl2_and {A B:Type} (P Q R : A → B → Prop): (∀ x y, R x y → P x y ∧ Q x y) ↔ ((∀ x y, R x y → P x y) ∧ (∀ x y, R x y → Q x y)).
Lemma eqb_subst_neq x y: x ≠ y → (x =? y) = false.
Lemma neq_lt_gt_iff (m n:nat): m ≠ n ↔ (m < n ∨ n < m).
Lemma length_nil : forall A (l : list A), length l = 0 -> l = nil.
simpl in H; contradict H; omega.

Lemma prod_beq_eq A B (A_beq : A -> A -> bool) (B_beq : B -> B -> bool) (A_beq_eq : forall a1 a2, A_beq a1 a2 = true <-> a1 = a2) (B_beq_eq : forall b1 b2, B_beq b1 b2 = true <-> b1 = b2) p1 p2 : prod_beq _ _ A_beq B_beq p1 p2 = true <-> p1 = p2.
apply internal_prod_dec_bl with A_beq B_beq; trivial; firstorder.
Lemma list_beq_eq A (A_beq : A -> A -> bool) l1 l2 (A_beq_eq : forall a1 a2, In a1 l1 -> In a2 l2 -> (A_beq a1 a2 = true <-> a1 = a2)) : list_beq _ A_beq l1 l2 = true <-> l1 = l2.
induction l1 as [ | a1 l1 IH ]; intros [ | a2 l2 ] A_beq_eq; simpl; try tauto; try (split; congruence).
injection H; clear H; intros; subst a2 l2.
split; [ apply A_beq_eq | apply IH ]; auto.
Lemma list_beq_refl (A : Type) (A_beq : A -> A -> bool) l : (forall a1 a2 : A, In a1 l -> In a2 l -> (A_beq a1 a2 = true <-> a1 = a2)) -> list_beq _ A_beq l l = true.
Lemma eq_None_neq_Some (A : Type) (x : option A) : x = None <-> forall v, x <> Some v.
Lemma neq_None_eq_Some : forall (A: Type) (x: option A), x <> None <-> (exists a, x = Some a).
intros A [ a | ]; split; intro H.
Lemma app_insert_r (A : Type) (l1 l1' l l2 l2' : list A): l1 ++ l2 = l1' ++ l2' -> length l2 = length l2' -> l1 ++ l ++ l2 = l1' ++ l ++ l2'.
induction l1 as [ | a1 l1 IH ]; simpl; intros l1' Heq Hlen.
rewrite IH with (l1' := l1'); trivial; simpl in *; congruence.
Fixpoint assoc {A B : Type}(eq : A -> A -> bool)(x : A)(l : list (A * B)) : option B := match l with | nil => None | (x', y) :: l' => if eq x x' then Some y else assoc eq x l' end.
Definition assoc_default {A B : Type} (eqA : A -> A -> bool) (d : B) (l : list (A * B)) (x : A) : B := match assoc eqA x l with | None => d | Some b => b end.
Lemma assoc_in {A B:Type} beq k (l: list (A * B)) {v}: (∀ a b:A, beq a b = true ↔ a=b) → assoc beq k l = Some v → (k,v) ∈ l.
induction l as [ | [a b] l1 IH ];try discriminate.
Lemma assoc_None_not_in {A B:Type} beq k (l:list (A*B)): (∀ a b : A, beq a b = true ↔ a = b) → assoc beq k l = None ↔ ¬ k ∈ map fst l.
Lemma in_assoc_neq_None (A B: Type) (beq: A -> A -> bool) (k: A) (l: list (A * B)): (forall a b:A, a = b -> beq a b = true) -> In k (map (@fst _ _) l) -> assoc beq k l <> None.
revert k; induction l as [ | x l IH ]; intros k Hin.
Lemma assoc_in_Some {A B:Type} (beq:A→A→bool) (k:A) (l: list (A*B)): (∀ a b, beq a b = true ↔ a=b) → k ∈ map fst l ↔ ∃ v, v ∈ map snd l ∧ assoc beq k l = Some v.
induction l; simpl in *; try tauto.
replace (beq k k) with true; auto.
Lemma assoc_in_Some_simple {A B:Type} beq k (l: list (A*B)): (∀ a b:A, beq a b = true ↔ a = b) → k ∈ map fst l ↔ (∃ v, assoc beq k l = Some v).
Lemma assoc_app_eq_None (A B:Type) (eq: A -> A -> bool) (x: A) (l1 l2: list (A * B)) : assoc eq x (l1 ++ l2) = None <-> (assoc eq x l1 = None /\ assoc eq x l2 = None).
induction l1 as [ | [a b] l1 IH ]; try tauto.
Lemma assoc_app_neq_None (A B:Type) (eq: A -> A -> bool) (x: A) (l1 l2: list (A * B)) : assoc eq x (l1 ++ l2) <> None <-> (assoc eq x l1 <> None \/ assoc eq x l2 <> None).
induction l1 as [ | [a b] l1 IH ]; try tauto.

Lemma assoc_app_eq_Some (A B:Type) (eq: A -> A -> bool) (x: A) (v : B) (l1 l2: list (A * B)) : assoc eq x (l1 ++ l2) = Some v <-> (assoc eq x l1 = Some v \/ (assoc eq x l1 = None /\ assoc eq x l2 = Some v)).
induction l1 as [ | [a b] l1 IH ]; simpl; split.
intros H1 [ H2 | [ H2 H3 ] ]; congruence.
Lemma assoc_app_in {K V:Type} beq k (l1 l2: list (K*V)): (∀ a b : K, beq a b = true ↔ a = b) → k ∈ map fst l1 → assoc beq k (l1++l2) = assoc beq k l1.
Lemma assoc_app_out {K V:Type} beq k (l1 l2: list (K*V)): (∀ a b : K, beq a b = true ↔ a = b) → ¬ k ∈ map fst l1 → assoc beq k (l1++l2) = assoc beq k l2.
rewrite <- (assoc_None_not_in beq k l1 H) in H0.
Lemma assoc_in_concat {K V:Type} beq (k:K) ll (v:V): assoc beq k (concat ll) = Some v → ∃ l : list (K * V), l ∈ ll ∧ assoc beq k l = Some v.
Lemma map_in_ext : forall (A B : Type) (f g : A -> B) (l : list A), (forall a : A, In a l -> f a = g a) -> map f l = map g l.
intros A B f g l H1; induction l as [ | a l IH ]; trivial.
apply IH; intros a' GH2; apply H1; simpl; tauto.
Lemma incl_cons_cons A: forall (a:A) (l1 l2: list A), incl l1 l2 -> incl (a::l1) (a::l2).
Lemma map_incl A B (f : A -> B) l1 l2 : incl l1 l2 -> incl (map f l1) (map f l2).
Lemma map_flat_map (A B C : Type) (f : A -> list B) (g : B -> C) (l : list A) : map g (flat_map f l) = flat_map (fun a => map g (f a)) l.
induction l as [ | a l IH]; simpl.
Lemma incl_filter (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) l: incl (filter f l) l.
induction l as [ | x l IH ]; simpl; try congruence.
Lemma filter_ext_In {A : Type} f g (l : list A): (forall a , In a l -> f a = g a)-> filter f l = filter g l.
case (g a); rewrite IHl; trivial; intro b; auto with *.
Lemma filter_app A (f : A -> bool) l1 l2 : filter f (l1 ++ l2) = filter f l1 ++ filter f l2.
destruct (bool_dec (f a) true) as [Heq | Heq]; [ | apply not_true_is_false in Heq]; rewrite Heq; rewrite IHl1; trivial.
Lemma filter_flat_map A B f (g : A -> list B) l : filter f (flat_map g l) = flat_map (fun x => filter f (g x)) l.
Lemma flat_map_in_ext A B (f g : A -> list B) l : (forall a : A, In a l -> f a = g a) -> flat_map f l = flat_map g l.
Lemma NoDup_filter A f (l : list A) : NoDup l -> NoDup (filter f l).
change (a:: l) with ([] ++ a :: l) in H.
apply NoDup_remove_1 in H; simpl in H.
apply NoDup_remove_2 in H2; simpl in H2.
destruct (bool_dec (f a) true) as [Heq | Heq]; [ | apply not_true_is_false in Heq]; rewrite Heq; [apply NoDup_cons; [ rewrite filter_In |] |]; tauto.
Lemma map_cons (A B : Type)(f : A -> B) a l : map f (a :: l) = f a :: map f l.
Lemma length_remove A eq_A_dec (a: A) l : length (remove eq_A_dec a l) <= length l.
induction l as [ | a' l IH ]; trivial.
destruct (eq_A_dec a a') as [ Heq | Hneq ]; simpl; auto with *.
Lemma length_cons_remove A eq_A_dec (a: A) l : In a l -> length (a :: remove eq_A_dec a l) <= length l.
induction l as [ | a' l IH ]; simpl; try tauto.
destruct (eq_A_dec a a) as [ _ | ]; try tauto.
destruct (eq_A_dec a a') as [ Heq | Hneq ]; auto with *.
Lemma neq_in_in_remove A eq_A_dec (a a': A) l: a' <> a -> In a l -> In a (remove eq_A_dec a' l).
induction l as [ | a'' l IH ]; trivial.
Lemma incl_remove_app A l l1 l2 (x : A) : ~ In x l -> incl l (l1 ++ x :: l2) -> incl l (l1 ++ l2).
assert (Hyl2 : In y (l1 ++ x :: l2)) by apply Hincl, Hyl.
Lemma flat_map_nil (A B: Type) (f: A -> list B) (xs: list A): (forall x, In x xs -> f x = []) -> flat_map f xs = [].
induction xs as [ | x xs IH]; trivial.
rewrite H, IH; trivial; auto with *; simpl; tauto.
Lemma flat_map_comp (A B C : Type) (f : A -> B) (g : B -> list C) (h : A -> list C) (l : list A) : (forall x, In x l -> h x = g (f x)) -> flat_map h l = flat_map g (map f l).
induction l as [ | a l IH]; trivial.
simpl; rewrite IH, H; trivial; simpl; try tauto; intros; apply H; apply in_cons; assumption.
Lemma flat_map_app (A B : Type) (f : A -> list B) l1 l2 : flat_map f (l1 ++ l2) = flat_map f l1 ++ flat_map f l2.
induction l1 as [ | a1 l1 IH ]; trivial.
Lemma comp_flat_map (A B C : Type) (f : A -> list B) (g : B -> list C) h l : (forall a, In a l -> h a = flat_map g (f a)) -> flat_map h l = flat_map g (flat_map f l).
induction l as [ | a l IH ]; trivial.
Fixpoint andl (l : list Prop) : Prop := match l with | nil => True | P :: l' => P /\ andl l' end.
Lemma andl_cons: forall a l, andl (a::l) <-> a /\ (andl l).
Lemma andl_in : forall l P, andl l -> In P l -> P.
intros l P H1 H2; induction l as [ | P' l IH ]; simpl in H2.
simpl in H1; destruct H2 as [ H2 | H2 ]; subst; tauto.
Lemma andl_in_map (A:Type): forall l (a:A) P, andl (map P l) -> In a l -> P a.
Lemma andl_map (A : Type) (f g : A -> Prop) l : andl (map f l) -> (forall a, In a l -> f a -> g a) -> andl (map g l).
induction l as [ | a l IH]; trivial.
Lemma andl_app l1 l2 : andl (l1 ++ l2) <-> andl l1 /\ andl l2.
induction l1 as [ | P l1 IH ]; simpl; tauto.
Fixpoint orl (l : list Prop) : Prop := match l with | nil => False | P :: l' => P \/ orl l' end.
Lemma andl_concat l: andl (concat l) <-> forall l', In l' l -> andl l'.
Lemma orl_map (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) l : orl (map P l) <-> exists x, In x l /\ P x.
induction l as [ | x l IH].
induction l as [ | y l IH]; trivial.
Fixpoint maxl (l : list nat) : nat := match l with | nil => 0 | n :: l' => max n (maxl l') end.
Lemma maxl_is_max : forall l n, In n l -> n <= maxl l.
intros l; induction l as [ | m l IH ]; intros n H; simpl in *.
Lemma all_max_le l y : (forall x, In x l -> x <= y) -> maxl l <= y.
induction l as [ | x l IH]; simpl.
Lemma maxl_app : forall (l1 l2 : list nat), maxl (l1 ++ l2) = max (maxl l1) (maxl l2).
intros l1 l2; induction l1 as [ | a1 l1 IH ]; trivial.
Lemma in_maxl (l : list nat) : l<>nil -> In (maxl l) l.
induction l as [ | n l IH].
destruct (max_dec n (maxl (m::l))) as [H | H]; rewrite H.
Lemma all_maxl P xs: xs <> [] -> (forall x, In x xs -> P x) -> P (maxl xs).
Lemma maxl_le_maxl A f g (l : list A) : (forall x, In x l -> f x <= g x) -> maxl (map f l) <= maxl (map g l).
induction l as [ | x l IH ]; trivial.
destruct (max_dec (f x) (maxl (map f l))) as [ H2 | H2 ]; rewrite H2.
Lemma maxl_map_const {A:Type} l (f: A → nat) n: (∀ x, x ∈ l → (f x) = n) → l ≠ [] → maxl (map f l) = n.
induction l; simpl; intros; try tauto.
Lemma maxl_map_0 A l (f : A -> nat) : (forall x, In x l -> (f x) = 0) -> maxl (map f l) = 0.
Lemma maxl_map_plus_le A f g (l : list A) : maxl (map (fun x => f x + g x) l) <= maxl (map f l) + maxl (map g l).
induction l as [ | x l IH]; trivial.
destruct (max_dec (f x + g x) (maxl (map (fun x0 : A => f x0 + g x0) l))) as [ H | H ]; rewrite H.
Lemma maxl_concat: forall l, maxl (concat l) = maxl (map maxl l).
Lemma maxl_map_lt_iff (A:Type): forall (l:list A) f n, 0<n -> maxl (map f l) < n <-> (forall m, In m l -> (f m) < n).
induction l; simpl; split; intros; auto; try destruct IHl.
apply le_lt_trans with (m:=Nat.max (f a) (maxl (map f l))); auto.
apply le_lt_trans with (m:=Nat.max (f a) (maxl (map f l))); auto.
Lemma maxl_map_le_iff (A:Type): forall (l:list A) f n, maxl (map f l) <= n <-> (forall m, In m l -> (f m) <= n).
induction l; simpl; split; intros; auto; try destruct IHl.
apply le_trans with (m:=Nat.max (f a) (maxl (map f l))); auto.
apply le_trans with (m:=Nat.max (f a) (maxl (map f l))); auto.
Lemma maxl_map_is_max_map (A:Type): forall (l:list A) f a, In a l -> (f a) <= maxl (map f l).
Lemma maxl_eq_maxl {A:Type} f g (l:list A): (∀ x : A, x ∈ l → f x = g x) → maxl (map f l) = maxl (map g l).
Lemma in_concat_iff (A:Type) x (l:list (list A)): x ∈ concat l <-> exists l', l' ∈ l /\ x ∈ l'.
Lemma incl_le_maxl : forall (l1 l2 : list nat), incl l1 l2 -> maxl l1 <= maxl l2.
intros n l1' H_l1; subst l1; set (l1 := n :: l1').
Lemma maxl_cons : forall n l, maxl (n::l) = max n (maxl l).
Lemma forall2_le_maxl : forall (l1 l2 : list nat), Forall2 le l1 l2 -> maxl l1 <= maxl l2.
Lemma incl_flat_map (A B : Type) (f g : A -> list B) l : (forall a, In a l -> incl (f a) (g a)) -> incl (flat_map f l) (flat_map g l).
induction l as [ | a l IH ]; simpl; try congruence.
Fixpoint suml (l : list nat) : nat := match l with | nil => 0 | n :: l' => n + suml l' end.
Lemma suml_cons n l : suml (n :: l) = n + suml l.
Lemma suml_map_const A n (l : list A) : suml (map (fun _ => n) l) = n * length l.
induction l as [ | a l IH]; trivial.
Lemma mult_suml_r m l : m * suml l = suml (map (fun n => m * n) l).
induction l as [ | n l IH]; simpl; try ring.
Lemma suml_app l1 l2 : suml (l1 ++ l2) = suml l1 + suml l2.
induction l1 as [ | n l1 IH]; simpl.
Lemma suml_flat_map (A : Type)(f : A -> list nat)(l :list A) : suml (flat_map f l) = suml (map suml (map f l)).
induction l as [ | x l IH]; trivial.
Lemma suml_flat_map_map (A B : Type) (f : A -> list B) (g : B -> nat) l : suml (flat_map (fun x => map g (f x)) l) = suml (map (fun x => suml (map g (f x))) l).
induction l as [ | a l IH ]; trivial.
Lemma suml_map_plus (A : Type)(f g : A -> nat)(l : list A) : suml (map (fun x => f x + g x) l) = suml (map f l) + suml (map g l).
induction l as [ | a l IH].
Lemma suml_map_le : forall (A : Type)(f g : A -> nat)(l : list A), (forall x, In x l -> f x <= g x) -> suml (map f l) <= suml (map g l).
intros A f g l H.
induction l as [ | x l IH ]; trivial.
apply IH; simpl in H; intros; apply H; tauto.
Lemma suml_map_eq : forall (A : Type)(f g : A -> nat)(l : list A), (forall x, In x l -> f x = g x) -> suml (map f l) = suml (map g l).
intros A f g l H.
induction l as [ | x l IH ]; trivial.
apply IH; simpl in H; intros; apply H; tauto.
Lemma suml_map_le_plus_length : forall (A : Type)(f g : A -> nat)(l : list A), (forall x, In x l -> f x <= g x + 1) -> suml (map f l) <= suml (map g l) + length l.
intros A f g l H.
induction l as [ | x l IH ]; simpl; try omega.
transitivity (g x + 1 + (suml (map g l) + length l)).
Lemma suml_le_len_times_bound l b : (forall x, In x l -> x <= b) -> suml l <= length l * b.
induction l as [ | x' l' IH ].
Lemma in_le_suml : forall (n : nat)(l : list nat), In n l -> n <= suml l.
induction l as [ | n' l IH ]; simpl; intro H_n_in.
Lemma maxl_le_suml l: maxl l <= suml l.
Lemma forall2_le_suml : forall (l1 l2 : list nat), Forall2 le l1 l2 -> suml l1 <= suml l2.
Lemma maxl_le_suml_map (A B : Type) (f : A -> list B) (g : B -> nat) (h : A -> nat) (l : list A) : (forall a, In a l -> maxl (map g (f a)) <= h a) -> maxl (map g (flat_map f l)) <= suml (map h l).
induction l as [ | a l IH]; simpl; trivial.
intro H1; rewrite map_app, maxl_app; destruct (max_dec (maxl (map g (f a))) (maxl (map g (flat_map f l)))) as [H2 | H2]; rewrite H2; clear H2.
apply IH; intros; apply H1; tauto.
Lemma suml_map_mult_le_suml_mult_maxl (A : Type) f g (l : list A) : suml (map (fun x => f x * g x) l) <= suml (map f l) * maxl (map g l).
induction l as [ | x l IH]; trivial.
Lemma suml_map_mult_le_suml_mult_suml (A : Type) f g (l : list A) : suml (map (fun x => f x * g x) l) <= suml (map f l) * suml (map g l).
induction l as [ | x l IH]; trivial.
Lemma length_flat_map (A B : Type) ( f : A -> list B) (l : list A) : length (flat_map f l) = suml (map (@length _) (map f l)).
induction l as [ | a l IH]; simpl; trivial.
Lemma seq_Succ n m : seq n (S m) = seq n m ++ [m + n].
Lemma Permutation_filter {A : Type} f (l : list A) : Permutation l (filter f l ++ filter (fun x => negb (f x)) l).
Lemma filter_compose {A : Type} f g (l : list A) : (forall x, In x l -> ( f x = true -> g x = true)) -> filter f (filter g l) = filter f l.
assert (Ha : f a = true -> g a = true) by auto with *.
Lemma in_seq : forall len start n : nat, In n (seq start len) <-> start <= n < start + len.
induction len; intros start n; split; intro H; simpl in H.
destruct H; [| apply IHlen in H]; omega.
Lemma Permutation_partition_list_nat b n l : (forall x, In x l -> b <= x < b + n) -> Permutation l (flat_map (fun n => filter (beq_nat n) l) (seq b n)).
revert b l; induction n; intros b l Hlt.
assert (Hf : b < b) by (apply le_lt_trans with h; apply Hlt; auto with *).
replace (flat_map (fun n : nat => filter (beq_nat n) l) (seq (S b) n)) with ((flat_map (fun n : nat => filter (beq_nat n) (filter (fun x : nat => negb (beq_nat b x)) l)) (seq (S b) n))).
assert (x < b + S n) by (apply Hlt; tauto).
Lemma length_suml_filter b n l: (forall x, In x l -> b <= x < b + n) -> suml (map (fun r => length(filter (beq_nat r) l )) (seq b n)) = length l.
Fixpoint prodl (l : list nat) : nat := match l with | nil => 1 | n :: l' => n * prodl l' end.
Lemma prodl_bound (l : list nat) (b : nat) : (forall x, In x l -> x <= b) -> prodl l <= Nat.pow b (length l).
Definition clos_refl {A : Type} (R : A -> A -> Prop) (x y : A) : Prop := R x y \/ x = y.
Lemma clos_refl_trans (A: Type) (R: A -> A -> Prop) t1 t2 t3: (R t1 t2 -> R t2 t3 -> R t1 t3) -> clos_refl R t1 t2 -> clos_refl R t2 t3 -> clos_refl R t1 t3.
intros H1 [H2 | H2] [H3 | H3]; subst; tauto.
Lemma Forall2_eq_clos_refl (A:Type) (R: A -> A -> Prop) (l1 :list A) : Forall2 (clos_refl R) l1 l1.
Lemma Forall_In_l (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) x xs: Forall P xs -> In x xs -> P x.
induction H1 as [ | x' xs H1 H2 H3]; simpl in *;try tauto.
Lemma Forall2_In_l (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) x xs ys : Forall2 R xs ys -> In x xs -> exists y, In y ys /\ R x y.
induction H1 as [ | x' y xs ys H1 H3 H4 ]; simpl in *; try tauto.
Lemma Forall2_In_r (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) y xs ys : Forall2 R xs ys -> In y ys -> exists x, In x xs /\ R x y.
induction H1 as [ | x y' xs ys H1 H3 H4 ]; simpl in *; try tauto.
Lemma Forall2_conj (A B : Type) (R1 R2 : A -> B -> Prop) xs ys : Forall2 R1 xs ys -> Forall2 R2 xs ys -> Forall2 (fun x y => R1 x y /\ R2 x y) xs ys.
induction H1 as [ | x y xs ys H1 H3 H4 ]; trivial.
Lemma Forall2_trans (A: Type) (R: A -> A -> Prop) xs ys zs : (forall x y z, In x xs -> In y ys -> In z zs -> R x y -> R y z -> R x z) -> Forall2 R xs ys -> Forall2 R ys zs -> Forall2 R xs zs.
induction H3 as [ | y z ys zs H3 H4 IH]; trivial; intros [ | x xs] H1 H2.
apply H1 with y; try (simpl; tauto).
intros x' y' z' H5 H7 H9 H10 H11.
apply H1 with y'; simpl; tauto.
Lemma Forall2_length A B (R : A -> B -> Prop) xs ys : Forall2 R xs ys -> length xs = length ys.
Lemma Forall2_map (A:Type) (B:Type): forall l f g (R:B->B->Prop), (forall (x:A), In x l -> R (f x) (g x)) -> Forall2 R (map f l) (map g l).

Lemma Forall2_flat_map (A B C D: Type) (R: C -> D -> Prop) (f: A -> list C) (g: B -> list D) (xs: list A) (ys: list B) : Forall2 (fun x y => Forall2 R (f x) (g y)) xs ys -> Forall2 R (flat_map f xs) (flat_map g ys).
induction xs as [ | x xs IH]; intros [ | y ys] H1; simpl.
Lemma Forall2_forall A (d: A) (R: A -> A -> Prop) (xs ys: list A) : Forall2 R xs ys -> forall i, i < length xs -> R (nth i xs d) (nth i ys d).
induction xs as [ | x xs IH ]; simpl; intros ys H1 i H2; try omega.
destruct ys as [ | y ys ]; try solve[inversion H1].
destruct i as [ | i ]; simpl; inversion H1; trivial; auto with *.

Inductive Exists2 {A B} (R: A -> B -> Prop) : list A -> list B -> Prop := | Exists2_cons_hd : forall x xs y ys, R x y -> Exists2 R (x::xs) (y::ys) | Exists2_cons_tl : forall x xs y ys, Exists2 R xs ys -> Exists2 R (x::xs) (y::ys).
Lemma Exists2_exists A (d: A) (R: A -> A -> Prop) (xs ys: list A) : Exists2 R xs ys -> exists i, i < length xs /\ R (nth i xs d) (nth i ys d).
induction xs as [ | x xs IH ]; intros ys H1; try solve[inversion H1].
destruct ys as [ | y ys ]; try solve[inversion H1].
inversion H1 as [ aa ab ac ad Hxy af ag | aa ab ac ad Hxsys af ag ]; subst.
Lemma app_eq_compat_l {A: Type} (xs ys zs: list A) : ys = zs -> xs ++ ys = xs ++ zs.
induction xs as [ | x xs IH ]; trivial; congruence.
Lemma In_prefix_suffix (A : Type) (a : A) l : In a l -> exists l1 l2, l = l1 ++ a :: l2.
induction l as [ | a' l IH ]; simpl; try tauto.
Lemma forall_exists_list (A B : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (Q : A -> B -> Prop) (l : list A) : (forall a, In a l -> P a -> exists b, Q a b) -> (Forall P l -> exists l', Forall2 Q l l').
destruct (H1 a) as [ b Hb ]; simpl; try tauto.
destruct IH as [l' Hl']; auto with *.
Lemma forall_andl (A: Type) (P: A -> Prop) (l: list A): Forall P l <-> andl (map P l).
Fixpoint revflatten {A: Type} (xss: list (list A)) : list A := match xss with | [] => [] | xs::xss' => revflatten xss' ++ xs end.
Lemma Permutation_flat_map_ext A B : forall l (f g : A -> list B), (forall x, In x l -> Permutation (f x) (g x)) -> Permutation (flat_map f l) (flat_map g l).
induction l; intros f g H.
Lemma Permutation_revflatten A B (f : A -> list B) l : Permutation(revflatten (map f l)) (flat_map f l).
Lemma In_seq n start len : In n (seq start len) <-> start <= n < start+len.
induction len as [ | len IH ]; intro start; simpl; try omega.
Lemma seq_S start len : seq start (S len) = seq start len ++ [start + len].
induction len as [ | len IH ]; intro start; simpl.
Lemma plus_eq_compat_l x y1 y2 : y1 = y2 -> x + y1 = x + y2.
Lemma plus_eq_compat_r x1 x2 y : x1 = x2 -> x1 + y = x2 + y.
Lemma count_occ_remove_O A eq_dec (a: A) l : count_occ eq_dec (remove eq_dec a l) a = 0.
induction l as [ | a' l IH ]; trivial.
destruct (eq_dec a a') as [ | Hneq]; trivial.
Lemma count_occ_remove_neq A eq_dec (a a': A) l : a<>a' -> count_occ eq_dec (remove eq_dec a' l) a = count_occ eq_dec l a.
induction l as [ | a'' l IH ]; trivial.
destruct (eq_dec a' a'') as [ Heq | Hneq'].
Lemma suml_map_count_occ_remove A eq_dec (a: A) l1 l2 : ~In a l2 -> suml (map (count_occ eq_dec (remove eq_dec a l1)) l2) = suml (map (count_occ eq_dec l1) l2).
induction l2 as [ | a' l2 IH ]; intros a l1 Hnotin; trivial.
assert (a' <> a /\ ~In a l2) as [Hneq Hnotin'] by tauto.
apply IH with (l1 := l1) in Hnotin'.
Lemma length_remove_count_occ A eq_dec (a: A) l: length l = length (remove eq_dec a l) + count_occ eq_dec l a.
induction l as [ | a' l IH ]; trivial.
destruct (eq_dec a a') as [ Heq | Hneq ].
Lemma in_remove_neq A eq_dec (a a': A) l : In a' (remove eq_dec a l) -> In a' l.
induction l as [ | a'' l IH ]; trivial.
Lemma length_count_occ a b l : (forall n, In n l -> a <= n < a + b) -> length l = suml (map (count_occ eq_nat_dec l) (seq a b)).
induction b as [ | b IH ]; intros a l.
destruct l as [ | n l ]; trivial.
replace (seq a (S b)) with (seq a b ++ [a + b]) by (symmetry; apply seq_S).
replace (suml (map (count_occ eq_nat_dec l) (seq a b))) with (suml (map (count_occ eq_nat_dec (remove eq_nat_dec (a+b) l)) (seq a b))).
Lemma count_occ_cons A eq_dec (a a': A) l : count_occ eq_dec (a::l) a' = if eq_dec a a' then S (count_occ eq_dec l a') else count_occ eq_dec l a'.
Lemma count_occ_app A eq_dec (a :A) l l' : count_occ eq_dec (l ++ l') a = count_occ eq_dec l a + count_occ eq_dec l' a.
Lemma count_occ_flat_map A B eq_B_dec (f: A -> list B) b l : count_occ eq_B_dec (flat_map f l) b = suml (map (fun a => count_occ eq_B_dec (f a) b) l).
Lemma tl_incl (A:Type): forall (a:A) l l', incl (a::l') l -> incl l' l.
Lemma NoDup_app (A: Type) (l1 l2: list A): (forall x, In x l1 -> ~ In x l2) -> NoDup l1 -> NoDup l2 -> NoDup (l1 ++ l2).
induction l1 as [ | x1 l1' IH ]; intros l2 Hnotin Hnodup1 Hnodup2.
inversion Hnodup1 as [ | aa ab Hnotin1 ad ae ].
apply IH; [ idtac | inversion Hnodup1; assumption | assumption ].
Lemma NoDup_split (A: Type) (l1 l2: list A): NoDup (l1 ++ l2) -> NoDup l1.
induction l2 as [ | x2 l2' IH ]; intros l1 Hnodupapp.
Lemma NoDup_split_right : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 : list A), NoDup (l1 ++ l2) -> NoDup l2.
change (a :: l1 ++ l2) with ([] ++ a :: l1 ++ l2) in H.
Theorem NoDup_cons_iff {A:Type} (a: A) (l: list A): NoDup (a::l) <-> ~ In a l /\ NoDup l.
Lemma NoDup_app_in_l A l l' : NoDup (l ++ l') -> forall x : A, (In x l) -> ~ (In x l').
revert l'; induction l; intros l' H x Hin.
Lemma NoDup_Permutation_NoDup A l l' : @NoDup A l -> Permutation.Permutation l l' -> NoDup l'.
replace (y :: x :: l) with ([y] ++ x :: l) in NDl by trivial.
Lemma NoDup_incl_le_length (A: Type) (l1 l2: list A): NoDup l1 -> incl l1 l2 -> length l1 <= length l2.
assert (In x l2) by apply Hincl, in_eq.

Lemma NoDup_flat_map A B (f : A -> list B) l : (forall x, In x l -> NoDup (f x)) -> NoDup l -> (forall x y, In x l -> In y l -> x <> y -> (forall z, In z (f x) <-> ~ In z (f y))) -> NoDup (flat_map f l).
induction l; intros Hf Hl Hmut.

Definition uniquify A (d : forall a b : A, { a = b} + { a <> b}) (l:list A) : list A := list_rect (fun _ : list A => list A) [] (fun (a : A) (_ l' : list A) => let s := in_dec d a l' in if s then l' else a :: l') l.
Lemma lt_0_pow x n : 0 < x -> 0 < Nat.pow x n.
Lemma pow_le_compat x y n: x <= y -> Nat.pow x n <= Nat.pow y n.
Lemma length_filter (A B : Type) (c : B -> bool) (f : A -> B) (xs : list A) : length (filter (fun x => c (f x)) xs) = length (filter c (map f xs)).
induction xs as [ | x xs IH ]; trivial.

Inductive sublist (A : Type) : (list A) -> (list A) -> Prop := | sublist_refl : forall l, sublist l l | sublist_skip : forall l1 h t, sublist l1 t -> sublist l1 (h :: t) | sublist_cons : forall h t1 t2, sublist t1 t2 -> sublist (h :: t1) (h :: t2).
Lemma sublist_nil A (l : list A) : sublist [] l.
Lemma sublist_incl A (l1 l2 : list A) : sublist l1 l2 -> incl l1 l2.
Lemma sublist_app_skip A (l1 l2 l3 : list A) : sublist l1 l3 -> sublist l1 (l2 ++ l3).
Lemma sublist_app_left A (l1 l2 l3 : list A) : sublist l1 l3 -> sublist (l2 ++ l1) (l2 ++ l3).
Lemma sublist_app_compat A (l1 l2 l3 l4 : list A) : sublist l1 l3 -> sublist l2 l4 -> sublist (l1 ++ l2) (l3 ++ l4).
intros H13 H14; induction H13; simpl.
Lemma sublist_flatmap_in_ext A B (f : A -> list B) g l: (forall x : A , In x l -> sublist (f x) (g x)) -> sublist (flat_map f l) (flat_map g l).
Lemma NoDup_sublist A (l1 l2 : list A) : sublist l1 l2 -> NoDup l2 -> NoDup l1.
intro H; induction H; intro Hnd.
Lemma NoDup_map_inv A B (f:A->B) l : NoDup (map f l) -> NoDup l.
induction l; simpl; inversion_clear 1; subst; constructor; auto.
Lemma In_In_list_decompose {A} (x y : A) l : In x l -> In y l -> x = y \/ exists l1 l2 l3, (l = l1 ++ x :: l2 ++ y :: l3) \/ (l = l1 ++ y :: l2 ++ x :: l3).
destruct Hx as [Hx | Hx]; destruct Hy as [Hy | Hy].
apply IHl in Hx; [| exact Hy].
destruct Hx as [Heq | (l1 & l2 & l3 & [H | H])]; [tauto | | ]; right; exists (a::l1); exists l2; exists l3; rewrite H; tauto.
Inductive lexprod : A*B -> A*B -> Prop := | lex_l : forall a a' b b', ltA a a' -> lexprod (a, b) (a', b') | lex_r : forall a b b', ltB b b' -> lexprod (a, b) (a, b').
Lemma acc_lex a b : Acc ltA a -> Acc ltB b -> Acc lexprod (a, b).

Lemma lexprod_trans : (forall a1 a2 a3, ltA a1 a2 -> ltA a2 a3 -> ltA a1 a3) -> (forall b1 b2 b3, ltB b1 b2 -> ltB b2 b3 -> ltB b1 b3) -> forall x1 x2 x3, lexprod x1 x2 -> lexprod x2 x3 -> lexprod x1 x3.
intros Htrans1 Htrans2 [a1 b1] [a2 b2] [a3 b3] H1 H2.
left; now apply Htrans1 with a2.
right; now apply Htrans2 with b2.

Definition lex_prod_dec: (forall a1 a2 : A, {a1 = a2} + {a1 <> a2}) -> (forall a1 a2, {ltA a1 a2} + {~ltA a1 a2}) -> (forall b1 b2, {ltB b1 b2} + {~ltB b1 b2}) -> (forall x y, {lexprod x y} + {~ lexprod x y}).
intros Heqdec Hdec1 Hdec2 [a1 b1] [a2 b2].
destruct (Hdec2 b1 b2) as [Htrue2 | Hfalse2]; subst.
Lemma non_empty_last (A:Type) d d' (l:list A): l <> [] -> (last l d) = (last l d').
replace (last (a :: a0 :: l) d) with (last (a0 :: l) d).
replace (last (a :: a0 :: l) d') with (last (a0 :: l) d').
Lemma cons_cons_last (A:Type) (a b:A) l x: last (a::b::l) x = last (b::l) x.
Lemma cons_last (A:Type) (a:A) l x: last (a::l) x = last l a.
Lemma last_in (A:Type) (l:list A) x: (last l x = x) \/ (In (last l x) l).
induction l; try destruct l; try rewrite cons_cons_last; try destruct IHl; simpl; auto.
Lemma beq_eq_dec {A : Type} {beq : A -> A -> bool} (Hbeq : forall x y, beq x y = true <-> x = y) : forall (x y : A), {x = y} + {~ x = y}.
Lemma firstn_map {A B : Type} (f : A -> B) l n : firstn n (map f l) = map f (firstn n l).
destruct l; simpl; trivial; now rewrite IHn.
Lemma skipn_map {A B : Type} (f : A -> B) l n : skipn n (map f l) = map f (skipn n l).
destruct l; simpl; trivial; now rewrite IHn.
Lemma skipn_app_length {A : Type} (l1 l2 : list A) : skipn (length l1) (l1 ++ l2) = l2.
Lemma firstn_app_length {A : Type} (l1 l2 : list A) : firstn (length l1) (l1 ++ l2) = l1.
Lemma skipn_nil : forall {A} n (x : list A), length x <= n -> skipn n x = nil.
induction n; simpl in *; trivial; intros.
Lemma firstn_seq n start len : firstn n (seq start len) = seq start (min n len).
Lemma skipn_seq n start len : skipn n (seq start len) = seq (start+n) (len-n).
Lemma skipn_firstn {A:Type} n (l:list A): skipn n (firstn n l) = [].
Lemma skipn_incl {A:Type} (l:list A) n: incl (skipn n l) l.
Lemma skipn_app2 {A : Type} (l l' : list A) n: length l = n → skipn n (l ++ l') = l'.
Lemma firstn_app {A} (l l' : list A) : firstn (length l) (l ++ l') = l.
Lemma firstn_app2 : forall (A : Type) (l l' : list A) n, length l = n -> firstn n (l ++ l') = l .
Definition ints (n m:nat):list nat := seq n (m-n).
Lemma ints_bounded : ∀ (x n m:nat), n ≤ m → x ∈ (ints n m) → n ≤ x < m.
Lemma ints_bounds : ∀ (x n m:nat), n ≤ x < m → x ∈ (ints n m).
Lemma ints_bounds_iff: ∀ x n m, n ≤ m → (n ≤ x < m ↔ x ∈ (ints n m)).
Lemma ints_length : ∀ n m, n ≤ m → length (ints n m) = m-n.
Lemma Forall_cons_iff {A:Type} (x:A) (xs:list A) (P:A→Prop): Forall P (x::xs) ↔ P x ∧ Forall P xs.
Lemma Forall_map_iff {A B:Type} (f: A → B) l (P: B → Prop): (∀ x, x ∈ l → P (f x)) ↔ Forall P (map f l).
Lemma Forall_app_iff {A:Type} (P:A→Prop) l1 l2: Forall P (l1++l2) ↔ Forall P l1 ∧ Forall P l2.
destruct H; [now apply H0 | now apply H1].
Lemma Forall_unary {A:Type} (P:A→Prop) a: Forall P [a] ↔ P a.
Lemma Forall_flat_map {A B:Type} (P:B → Prop) (f:A → list B) l: Forall P (flat_map f l) ↔ Forall (λ x, Forall P (f x)) l.
induction l; simpl; split; intros; try apply Forall_nil.
Lemma concat_unary_is_map {A B:Type}: ∀ l (f:A→B), concat (map (λ x, [f x]) l) = map f l.
Lemma in_concat_const_is_in {A B:Type} (a:A) lfix l: a ∈ concat (map (λ _ : B, lfix) l) ↔ l ≠ [] ∧ a ∈ lfix.
Lemma incl_map_flat_map {A B:Type} (xs:list A) (f:A → B) g: (∀ x : A, x ∈ xs → f x ∈ g x) → incl (map f xs) (flat_map g xs).
Lemma incl_flat_map_incl {A B C:Type} (xs:list A) (r:A→list B) (rh:B→list C) lh: (∀ x : A, x ∈ xs → incl (flat_map rh (r x)) (lh x)) → incl (flat_map rh (concat (map r xs))) (flat_map lh xs).
Lemma app_length_eq {A:Type}: ∀ (l1 l2 l1' l2': list A), length l1 = length l1' → (l1++l2) = (l1'++l2') → l1 = l1' ∧ l2 = l2'.
generalize (IHl1 l2 l1' l2' H2 H4).
Lemma Forall2_le_refl l: Forall2 le l l.
Lemma Forall2_app_inv {A B:Type} (P:A→B→Prop) la1 la2 lb1 lb2: length la1 = length lb1 → Forall2 P (la1++la2) (lb1++lb2) → Forall2 P la1 lb1 ∧ Forall2 P la2 lb2.
generalize (app_length_eq lb1 lb2 x x0 H4 H3).

Lemma Forall2_firstn {A B:Type} (P:A→B→Prop) la lb n: Forall2 P la lb → Forall2 P (firstn n la) (firstn n lb).
apply (Forall2_app_inv (firstn n la) (skipn n la) (firstn n lb) (skipn n lb)); auto.
Lemma Forall2_skipn {A B:Type} (P:A→B→Prop) la lb n: Forall2 P la lb → Forall2 P (skipn n la) (skipn n lb).
apply (Forall2_app_inv (firstn n la) (skipn n la) (firstn n lb) (skipn n lb)); auto.
Lemma Forall2_firstn_skipn_iff {A B:Type} (P:A→B→Prop) la lb n: Forall2 P la lb ↔ Forall2 P (firstn n la) (firstn n lb) ∧ Forall2 P (skipn n la) (skipn n lb).
Lemma Forall2_tail {A B:Type} (P:A→B→Prop) la lb: Forall2 P la lb → Forall2 P (tl la) (tl lb).

apply IH with (l1 := l1) in Hnotin'.
induction l as [ | a' l IH ]; trivial.
destruct (eq_dec a a') as [ Heq | Hneq ].
induction l as [ | a'' l IH ]; trivial.

destruct l as [ | n l ]; trivial.

assert (In x l2) by apply Hincl, in_eq.

intros H13 H14; induction H13; simpl.

apply IHl in Hx; [| exact Hy].

left; now apply Htrans1 with a2.
right; now apply Htrans2 with b2.

replace (last (a :: a0 :: l) d') with (last (a0 :: l) d').
